teams.name: Paying It Forward
teams.loan_because: We feel our lives have benefitted from the generosity of others and want to "Pay It Forward' by helping others through Kiva loans.  Join us if you want to return some favours to the world.
teams.description: The cost of one 'dinner out for two' is enough for people working their way out of poverty to have the chance to improve their lives. Repaid loans can continue to be relent over and over into the future, helping many hundreds in our lifetimes.

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Kiva Mormons
teams.loan_because:
"A man filled with the love of God
is not content with blessing his 
family alone, but ranges through 
the whole world, anxious to bless 
the whole human race."

- Joseph Smith
teams.description: Members and friends of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints who are also Kiva lenders.

teams.name: Friends of Dynamically Speaking
teams.loan_because: We are caring Toastmasters and friends of Toastmasters. Our goal is to encourage at least 100 generous donors to join our lending team and to make a loan.
teams.description: We are micro philanthropists from around the world.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about the suffering of human beings.
teams.description:
We know we are one human family.

**New to the team? Read this: http://is.gd/51mxq  

** FriendFeed:
http://friendfeed.com/rooms/aasfshnr

** Facebook Group:
http://is.gd/lzMJ

SECULAR MFI ONLY loan search:
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

teams.name: Unitarian Universalist Church in Cherry Hill, NJ
teams.loan_because: Microloans are an ideal way for people to help each other obtain the resources they need to build better lives.
teams.description: Committed Unitarian Universalists striving to improve the lives of others.

teams.name: Heartland Oklahoma Team
teams.loan_because: Oklahomans are always willing to lend a hand to our neighbors as well as to total strangers.
teams.description: An active team of Oklahomans joining together to fund loans, work toward goals, and have fun with Kiva loan challenges.

teams.name: Urban Bridge Church
teams.loan_because: We are Christians.
teams.description: We are a small church of Christ followers who believe that loving one another and the poor is integral to our faith.

teams.name: Kiva Washington, DC
teams.loan_because: The international community in DC believes and understands the importance of assisting people around the world to achieve their dreams and freedoms.

teams.name: Tampa Bay, Florida
teams.loan_because: We are a diverse group of Kiva members who share a connection by living in the Tampa Bay, Florida area.  We also want to make the world a better place.
teams.description:
The Tampa Bay area includes the following major towns and cities:  



Anna Maria, Apollo Beach, Balm, Belleair, Boca Ciega, Boyette, Bradenton, Brandon, Carrollwood, Citrus Park, Clearwater, Clearwater Beach, Dade City, Dover, Dunedin, Durant, Gibsonton, Gulfport, Indian Rocks Beach, Innisbrook, Land O' Lakes, Largo, Lithia, Longboat Key, Lutz, Kathleen, Madeira Beach, Mango, New Port Richey, Odessa, Oldsmar, Palm Harbor, Palm River, Palma Ceia, Palmetto, Pasco, Pinellas Park, Progress Village, Redington Beach, Riverview, Ruskin, Safety Harbor, Saint Pete Beach, Saint Petersburg, Sarasota, Seffner, Seminole, South Tampa, Sun City Center, Tampa, Tarpon Springs, Temple Terrace, Tierra Verde, Town 'n' Country, Treasure Island, Valrico, West Chase, Wimauma, and Zephyrhills.

teams.name: Lisboa -Portugal
teams.loan_because: WE CARE WE HELP

teams.name: Catholic Kiva
teams.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
teams.description: Anyone is welcome to join our group.  The team is just for fun and to help build community.

teams.name: AquaSource
teams.loan_because: We support taking responsibility for one's own health & happiness. We understand we are all inter-dependent. We respect: hard work; those who show initiative and seek to serve and who take action.
teams.description: We are a network marketing company selling natural products, enabling people to run their own business and accelerate their own personal development within a supportive, positive community. We invite distributors to join our team on Kiva!

teams.name: España - Spain
teams.loan_because: Kiva ofrece un medio ideal para participar activamente en el apoyo a emprendedores sin recursos que no pueden acceder a los canales normales de financiación y que, gracias a los micro-créditos, pueden  desarrollar una actividad empresarial que les permita, a ellos y su entorno, alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
teams.description:
Este club se creó con la intención inicial de fomentar la participación de españolas y españoles en Kiva, no obstante,  está abierto a todas las personas que deseen unirse a él, sin importar su nacionalidad ni ninguna otra condición.
 
El único referente identitario de este grupo es la solidaridad y la convicción de que, a través de Kiva, es posible el apoyo a personas o grupos emprendedores que buscan y merecen una oportunidad por su esfuerzo.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com
teams.loan_because: We care.
teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: Team Reddit!
teams.loan_because: We redditors believe change is something that we should all take responsibility for.
teams.description: A group of people from the social news website reddit - started not by reddit admins, but by redditors themselves.

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner;_default_max=0.5&partner;_risk_rating_min=1&partner;_risk_rating_max=5&partner;_arrears_min=0&partner;_arrears_max=1.1

Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27)

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
www.gerv.net/info/christian-field-partners
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Robert Kennedy College - Zürich
teams.loan_because: Microfinance is an important engine for economic development
teams.description: Students, alumni and friends of the Robert Kennedy College

teams.name: C.S.R.
teams.loan_because: We have enough.
teams.description: We are a student society of 230 Christian students from the Delft University of Technology.
